definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: So making the study of slag mucks as silicon fertilizer was significant.
sentences.chinese: 因此，开展工矿废渣作硅肥的研究具有重要意义。

sentences.english: Water release curve of PSW was similar to that of SRH.
sentences.chinese: 纸厂废渣的水分释放曲线与砻糠田土相似。

sentences.english: Landfills can contaminate drinking-water if they not properly constructed.
sentences.chinese: 废渣填埋地如果构建不当则可能污染饮用水。

sentences.english: A description is given of the production of fine coal ash bricks from gasifer slag and boiler cinder.
sentences.chinese: 介绍利用造气炉渣和锅炉废渣生产粉煤灰砖的情况。

sentences.english: Ground granulate blast furnace slag (GGBFS) is a by-product of the iron and steel manufacturing industry.
sentences.chinese: 高炉矿渣是中国钢铁业大量排放的一种冶金废渣。

sentences.english: The high-effective water treatment agent-polyaluminium chloride is produced by industrial aluminiferous waste slag.
sentences.chinese: 利用工业含铝废渣生产高效水处理剂聚合氯化铝。

sentences.english: Barium slag is by-product in the manufacture of the barium salt. It belongs to the industrial waste residue.
sentences.chinese: 钡渣是钡盐生产中的残余固体，属于工业废渣。

sentences.english: Cr-Fe waste residue is derived from production of chromate or chromium oxide.
sentences.chinese: 铬铁废渣是生产铬盐或其氧化物所排放的废渣。

sentences.english: Cr-Fe waste residue is derived from production of chromate or chromium oxide.
sentences.chinese: 铬铁废渣是生产铬盐或其氧化物所排放的废渣。

sentences.english: The industry waste slag fly ash or the river sand is used as the siliceous material.
sentences.chinese: 工业废渣粉煤灰或河砂一般被用来作为硅质材料。

sentences.english: The technological process for preparing phosphorous acid from the production waste of sodium hypophosphite was described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了从次磷酸钠生产废渣中回收提取亚磷酸的工艺。

sentences.english: Hazardous materials, sludges and abrasives no longer need to contaminate your vac truck.
sentences.chinese: 有害材料，废渣和磨料不会污染你的真空吸尘器车。

sentences.english: This kind of tailings are useless waste residues discarded after dressing gold ore.
sentences.chinese: 金矿尾矿为黄金矿石经选矿后弃而无用的废渣。

sentences.english: The recovery processes of waste residue of tribasic lead sulfate were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了三盐基硫酸铅废渣回收生产工艺。

sentences.english: There are no hazardous gases, dusts, residues and slags produced during nickel refining.
sentences.chinese: 镍在精炼过程中不产生有害气体和粉尘，没有废渣。

definition: mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
three types of waste product, namely: waste water 廢水|废水[fei4 shui3], exhaust gas 廢氣|废气[fei4 qi4], industrial slag 廢渣|废渣[fei4 zha1]
remnants of material from an industrial process/offcut/scraps
